message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $90. This is a one-time offer, so let me know if you're interested!
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product and would like to make a counteroffer of $75. I hope this aligns better with my budget.

Hi Bob, thank you for your counteroffer of $75. I appreciate your interest in the product, but I'm not willing to go that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $82. This is a fair price considering the value the product will bring to you. Let me know if this is something you'd be interested in.
